symbol_explainer_text: The symbols ‚òÖ and ‚ñ≤ represent you and your partner. They indicate who performs the action on each card. For example, if the card says '‚òÖ gives a massage to ‚ñ≤', the person with the ‚òÖ symbol is the one giving the massage.
symbol_explainer_note: The symbols are unique to your couple and were randomly assigned when you connected.
tutorial_step1_subtitle: To start, one of you generates a code and the other enters it to link accounts.

tutorial_step2_card_text: ‚òÖ gives a sensual massage to ‚ñ≤, exploring the back and neck slowly.
tutorial_step2_oops_instruction: Swiped wrong? Use the Oops! button to undo your last dislike.
tutorial_step3_subtitle: When you and your partner like the same card, it becomes a Link and appears here!

tutorial_step4_subtitle: Click on a Link to open the chat. Each card has its own private conversation.

tutorial_step6_subtitle: Explore, have fun, and discover new Links with your partner. Good game!

tips_poder_left_0: Didn't like the dynamic? No problem.
tips_poder_left_1: If it's not for you, that's okay.
tips_poder_left_4: Didn't feel the exchange? Toss it.
tips_poder_left_6: Okay not to be in this vibe today.
tips_poder_left_7: Dominance only if both want it.
tips_poder_left_8: Submission? Only if it's your will.
tips_poder_left_9: No one judges you for passing.
tips_poder_left_11: It's not a debate, it's your choice.
tips_poder_left_14: This one didn't catch you? Normal.
tips_poder_left_15: The power is yours to say no.
tips_poder_right_0: Consent is the foundation of everything!
tips_poder_right_8: The 'yes' from both opens the game.
tips_poder_right_11: Aftercare is important after intense scenes.
tips_poder_right_12: Have fun with the power exchange!
tips_poder_right_17: Listen to the body and signals.
tips_poder_right_19: May the force (of lust) be with you!
tips_sensorial_left_2: No one is obliged to like everything.
tips_sensorial_left_3: If it doesn't seem pleasurable, reject.
tips_sensorial_left_4: This sensation doesn't attract you? Pass.
tips_sensorial_left_6: Sensitive skin? Better not risk it.
tips_sensorial_left_7: Didn't like the proposal? No problem.
tips_sensorial_left_8: Listen to your body and limits.
tips_sensorial_left_9: Okay not to want this experience.
tips_sensorial_left_10: Some sensations are not for everyone.
tips_sensorial_left_13: Maybe another one pleases you more.
tips_sensorial_left_14: Your intuition says no? Trust it.
tips_sensorial_left_16: If it doesn't give you chills (the good kind), don't go.
tips_sensorial_left_17: Some things are better just in idea.
tips_sensorial_left_19: Pass this one and wait for the next wave.
tips_sensorial_right_2: If it doesn't give pleasure, STOP.
tips_sensorial_right_8: Do not cross what was agreed.
tips_sensorial_right_14: Pain only if pleasurable and agreed.
tips_sensorial_right_16: If something bothers, say it RIGHT AWAY.
tips_fantasia_left_0: This story doesn't inspire you? Ok.
tips_fantasia_left_2: Another imagination in mind? No problem.
tips_fantasia_left_4: If the scenario doesn't please, reject.
tips_fantasia_left_5: Not obliged to enter the play.
tips_fantasia_left_7: Okay not to want to enact this.
tips_fantasia_left_10: Imagination is free, including to say no.
tips_fantasia_left_11: If it's not fun, it doesn't count.
tips_fantasia_left_15: Feel free to pass this one.
tips_fantasia_right_14: Pause if something goes off script.
tips_fantasia_right_17: Fantasy is an invitation, not an order.
tips_exposicao_left_1: Prefer to keep it just between you?
tips_exposicao_left_3: If you don't feel safe, reject.
tips_exposicao_left_4: Not in the mood to expose yourself?
tips_exposicao_left_6: Okay not to want an audience today.
tips_exposicao_left_10: Your body, your decision to show.
tips_exposicao_left_11: No need to prove anything to anyone.
tips_exposicao_left_13: If it's not fun, why do it?
tips_exposicao_left_19: Not the moment for this yet.
tips_exposicao_right_6: Fun is in allowing yourself with sense.
tips_exposicao_right_7: If involving third parties, clear dialogue!
tips_exposicao_right_10: Digital privacy is crucial if filming/photographing.
tips_exposicao_right_12: If in public, discretion is friend.
tips_exposicao_right_13: Trust each other to protect yourselves.
tips_exposicao_right_14: Agree on signals if things go out of control.
tips_exposicao_right_16: The goal is to excite, not get in trouble.
tips_exposicao_right_17: Make sure the location is safe.
tips_conexao_left_0: Didn't feel the connection with this proposal? Ok.
tips_conexao_left_1: Prefer another way to connect now?
tips_conexao_left_2: If it doesn't seem intimate enough, pass.
tips_conexao_left_3: Your intuition about connection is valid.
tips_conexao_left_4: Not in the mood for this interaction? No problem.
tips_conexao_right_2: Small gestures make a big difference.
